com.project.TheLittleGardener

Class Joystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.TheLittleGardener.MetricsOfScreen
      • com.project.TheLittleGardener.Joystick

  • public class Joystick
extends MetricsOfScreen
    Contains all methods which enable user to move in the specific direction
